txt.en: Glass-spiders can be found in Glittengrof in Gloomingtarn.\n\nWhile exploring Glittengrof, you have encountered an invasive swarm of glass-spiders dwelling among the ancient crystal-lodes of Mount Gundabad. You should defeat glass-spiders in Glittengrof.
You have defeated many of the invasive glass-spiders in Glittengrof.

Glass-spiders can be found in Glittengrof in Gloomingtarn.\n\nWhile exploring Glittengrof, you have encountered an invasive swarm of glass-spiders dwelling among the ancient crystal-lodes of Mount Gundabad. You should defeat glass-spiders in Glittengrof.
Although none can be certain if Gloomingtarn shall ever again be warded against invaders great or small, you have done well to drive off the glass-spiders in Glittengrof.

While surveying Glittengrof, you have encountered an invasive swarm of glass-spiders. Although they have long dwelt beneath Mount Gundabad, the glass-spiders have never before entered the hallowed caverns of Gloomingtarn. Perhaps an unintended consequence of the Iron Crown's efforts to breach the warding-runes of Gloomingtarn, the glass-spiders have swelled up from the depths of the mountain to make a new home among the ancient crystal-lodes of Glittengrof.\n\nYou should defeat the glass-spiders and drive them out of Glittengrof.
After the Iron Crown breached the warding-runes of Gloomingtarn, an invasive swarm of glass-spiders burrowed into the ancient crystal-lodes of Glittengrof.
